name: Drift Racing Dirt Bike Race
description:
The Best Mobile game to capture the true essence of Wheelie Stunt Riding.

Master the skill of riding with one wheel ! Win the levels and travel around the world to see all the amazing landscapes.

Fast reactions, good hand-eye coordination and observation skills, sharp anticipation skills, and ample reserves of courage are all very important traits for this game.

Game Features

- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
- Exciting
- Different terrains/location
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- CRAZY jumps and loops
- Beautiful off-road terrains
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics
